typeProperties.script:
source(output(
		currency_code_from as string,
		currency_code_to as string,
		currency_id_from as long,
		currency_id_to as long,
		day as date,
		rate as decimal(28,10)
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: false,
	validateSchema: true,
	isolationLevel: 'READ_UNCOMMITTED',
	query: 'select \ncurrency_code_from,\ncurrency_code_to,\ncurrency_id_from,\ncurrency_id_to,\nday,\nrate\nfrom \ndwh_stage.hlp_exchange_rate',
	format: 'query') ~> hlpExhangeRate
hlpExhangeRate filter(currency_code_to=='USD') ~> FltrUSDCurrency
FltrUSDCurrency sink(input(
		exchange_rate as decimal(28,10),
		from_currency_id as long,
		from_currency_code as string,
		to_currency_id as long,
		exchange_to_date as date,
		to_currency_code as string,
		exchange_from_date as date
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	deletable:false,
	insertable:true,
	updateable:false,
	upsertable:false,
	truncate:true,
	format: 'table',
	mapColumn(
		exchange_rate = rate,
		from_currency_id = currency_id_from,
		from_currency_code = currency_code_from,
		to_currency_id = currency_id_to,
		exchange_to_date = day,
		to_currency_code = currency_code_to,
		exchange_from_date = day
	),
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> hlpExchangeRateUSD
